## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6b196a3a87537db3bd5691899d5c2481f27bcee88d6cf9e8576578929b376086)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'install-pyyaml' @ 1.19.12 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
